mapper.select: SELECT t.pdf_id AS pdfId, t.user_id AS userId, t.data_type AS dataType, t.report_no AS reportNo, t.need_computing_country AS needComputingCountry, t.create_date AS createDate FROM vat_pdf_result t WHERE t.user_id= #{pdfReport.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.data_type= #{pdfReport.dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t.create_date DESC

SELECT t.pdf_id AS pdfId, t.user_id AS userId, t.data_type AS dataType, t.report_no AS reportNo, t.need_computing_country AS needComputingCountry, t.file_path AS filePath, t.create_date AS createDate FROM vat_pdf_result t WHERE t.pdf_id= #{pdfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vat_pdf_result ( user_id, data_type, report_no, need_computing_country, file_path ) VALUES ( #{pdfReportVO.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdfReportVO.dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdfReportVO.reportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdfReportVO.needComputingCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdfReportVO.filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
